modName: Joralla - Two Handed Trainer and Follower
summary: Joralla is a two handed trainer and follower. She is available in Custom UUNP, Base UNP, and Base CBBE. HDT Armor & No Armor Versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iwvxnldl3/20180509164039_1_With_Text.png[/img]﻿

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]﻿
[font=Verdana]Name:  Joralla
Race:  Custom Nord
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriage:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  100
Body:  Custom UUNP, Base UNP & CBBE
Skin:  Fair Skin Optimized
Weapon:  Flamberge (Upgradeable)(Battleaxe Version)
Armor:  Steamforge (Without Pauldrons)
Location:  Warmaidens, Whiterun 

Levels With Player
Spells:  Vanilla Healing
Perks:  Two Handed (Full), Heavy Armor (Partial), Block (Partial), and Lightfoot

Combat:  Boss Two Handed
Style:  Custom Trainer

Tested with EFF, AFT
ENBs in Screenshots:  Caffeine & Rudy

Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  I have no immediate plans to do so

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*?
A:  I have no intentions on doing individual requests.

Q:  She is stretching....Invisible
A:  Please google HDT fixes that may work on your system.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
